creator: crazy_lonewolf@hotmail.com
text:
I keep getting these error messages constantly in my error log and it's 
filling my hard drive up rather quickly:

[Sun Jan 18 02:05:12 2004] [error] (22)Invalid argument: accept: (client 
socket) failed with errno = 10035

thanks for any help on stopping this from erroring on me.

I had a php loop that didn't stop and the error log filled up. please put a file
size limit on it.
creator: gatoatigrado@myrealbox.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
There is absolutely NO way we would limit the entries in the error log, 
potentially preventing administrators from diagnosing their issues.

If you have a runaway error log, you have a serious problem to address.
In your case, see the DisableWin32AcceptEx directive.
